governance_rules.title: Honor the Eight Domains
governance_rules.description: Every commit or action must align with at least one Domain of the Life Architect Ontology.

governance_rules.title: Establish Awareness
governance_rules.description: Every commit or action must align with established Ontology.

governance_rules.title: Invoke Guidance at Thresholds
governance_rules.description: Before major architectural decisions, summon Thyrvaelyn or Rynlyrayn to illuminate unseen pathways.

governance_rules.title: Thresholds Require Thyrvaelryn
governance_rules.description: Before major architectural decisions, summon Thyrvaelryn.

governance_rules.title: Trace Ontological Links
governance_rules.description: All Pull Requests and Issues must reference at least one related Topic, Issue, or Order in the Ontology.

governance_rules.title: Preserve Emergence
governance_rules.description: Allow living evolution through Topics and Orders; no rigid lock unless a new Emergence Protocol is followed.
